IntroSection.name: All
IntroSection.short_intro: I enjoy the process of learning and the sense of achievement in applying what I have learned!

AboutSection.desc:
I am a full-stack developer with a passion for technology and a keen attention to detail in coding. I have a strong ability to independently develop and deliver projects, and I take my work seriously and responsibly. Over the years, I've gained valuable development experience and improved my technical skills. I have cultivated a good coding style and adhere strictly to code standards. Additionally, I have enhanced my understanding of the industry and developed strong communication, teamwork, and collaboration skills 🛠️🌐.
When I'm not at the computer, I enjoy cooking, watching movies and anime, and working out 🍳🎥💪.
Regular exercise, sleep, and a balanced diet are my secrets to staying energized 🌟.
